brief: Set amplitude and pan position with one method.
name: set()
description: Set amplitude and pan position with one method.

parameters.name: amp
parameters.description:
the volume to grab the input at as a value from 0.0 (complete
            silence) to 1.0 (full volume)

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description:
pan the audio input in a stereo panorama. Allowed values are
            between -1.0 (left) and 1.0 (right)
